    • 构造器详细资料

      • JMessageClient

        public JMessageClient(String appkey,
                      String masterSecret)
        Create a JMessage Client.
        参数:
        appkey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.

      • JMessageClient

        public JMessageClient(String appkey,
                      String masterSecret,
                      int maxRetryTimes)
        Create a JMessage Client with custom maxRetryTimes.
        参数:
        appkey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        maxRetryTimes - The max retry times.

      • JMessageClient

        public JMessageClient(String appkey,
                      String masterSecret,
                      cn.jpush.api.common.connection.HttpProxy proxy)
        Create a JMessage Client with a proxy.
        参数:
        appkey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        proxy - The proxy, if there is no proxy, should be null.

      • JMessageClient

        public JMessageClient(String appkey,
                      String masterSecret,
                      String hostname)
        Create a JMessage Client with a custom hostname. If you are using JPush/JMessage privacy cloud, maybe this constructor is what you needed.
        参数:
        appkey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        hostname - The custom hostname.

      • JMessageClient

        public JMessageClient(String appkey,
                      String masterSecret,
                      cn.jpush.api.common.connection.HttpProxy proxy,
                      JMessageConfig config)
        Create a JMessage Client by custom Client configuration. If you are using custom parameters, maybe this constructor is what you needed.
        参数:
        appkey - The KEY of one application on JPush.
        masterSecret - API access secret of the appKey.
        proxy - The proxy, if there is no proxy, should be null.
        config - The client configuration. Can use JMessageConfig.getInstance() as default.

      • addOrRemoveMembers

        public void addOrRemoveMembers(long gid,
                               String[] addList,
                               String[] removeList)
                        throws cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIConnectionException,
                               cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIRequestException
        Add or remove members from a group
        参数:
        gid - The group id
        addList - If this parameter is null then send remove request
        removeList - If this parameter is null then send add request
        抛出:
        cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIConnectionException
        cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIRequestException

      • sendMessage

        public SendMessageResult sendMessage(Integer version,
                                     String targetType,
                                     String targetId,
                                     String fromType,
                                     String fromId,
                                     String messageType,
                                     MessageBody messageBody)
                              throws cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIConnectionException,
                                     cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIRequestException
        Send message
        参数:
        version - Current version is 1
        targetType - Group or single
        targetId - The message receiver
        fromType - Only support admin now
        fromId - Sender
        messageType - Only support text now
        messageBody - A MessageBody instance
        返回:
        抛出:
        cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIConnectionException
        cn.jpush.api.common.resp.APIRequestException
